ask-roles-hint.one: Type the roles to mention for this feed (either names, IDs or mentions), separated by spaces.
ask-roles-hint.many: Type the roles to mention for these feeds (either names, IDs or mentions), separated by spaces.

change-txt:
Please enter the text to be used when creating a new post. You can use several variables, of which here is the list:
- `{author}`: the author of the post
- `{channel}`: the channel name (usually the same as author)
- `{date}`: the post date (UTC)
- `{link}` or `{url}`: a link to the post
- `{logo}`: an emoji representing the type of post (web, Twitter, YouTube...)
- `{mentions}`: the list of mentioned roles
- `{title}`: the title of the post
choose-delete: Please choose the feeds to delete
choose-disable: Please choose the feeds to disable
choose-enable: Please choose the feeds to enable
choose-mentions-1: Please choose the feeds to modify

delete-success.one: The feed has been successfully deleted!

disable-success.one: The feed has been successfully disabled!

enable-success.one: The feed has been successfully enabled!

embed-json-changed: The embed of this feed has been modified
flow-limit: For performance reasons, you cannot track more than %{limit} rss feeds per server.
guild-complete: %{count} rss streams have been correctly reloaded, in %{time} seconds!
guild-error:
An error occurred during the procedure: `%{err}`
If you think this error is not your own, you can report it to support
invalid-flow: This url is invalid (empty or inaccessible RSS feeds) :confused:
invalid-link: Oops, this url address is invalid or incomplete :confused:
list:
*Type the number of the feeds to modify*

**Link - Type - Channel - Mentions**
list-title: List of rss feeds from the server %{server}
list2:
*Type the number of the feeds to delete*

**Link - Type - Channel**
loop-processing: A check of your RSS feeds is already in progress. Please wait a few minutes

move-success.many: %{count} RSS feeds have been moved to the channel %{channel}!
move-success.one: One RSS feed has been moved in the channel %{channel}!

no-feed: Oops, you don't have any rss feeds to manage!
no-feed2: This server has no rss feed!
no-feed-filter: No feed can be selected for this command!
no-roles: No role has been configured yet.
not-a-role: This role can't be found. Try again:
nothing: I found nothing on this search :confused:

picker-placeholder.multi: Choose one or multiple RSS feeds

research-timeout: The web page took too long to answer, I had to interrupt the process :eyes:

edit-success.many: This feed has been modified to mention the roles %{roles}
edit-success.one: This feed has been modified to mention the role %{roles}
edit-success.zero: This feed has been modified to not mention any role

roles.list: Here is the list of roles already notified: %{roles}

success-add: The rss feed of type "%{type}" with link <%{url}> has been properly added in the channel %{channel}!

text-success.single:
The text of the feed #%{id} has been modified!
 New text: 
```
%{text}
```
text-success.multiple:
The text of these feeds have been modified!
 New text: 
```
%{text}
```

tw-no-tweet: It looks like this user has never tweeted :confused:
twitch-invalid: Oops, I couldn't find any Twitch channel with this name!
use_embed-same: The use of embeds for this feed has not changed
use_embed-success: The value has been modified to %{v} for feed nÂ°%{id}!
use_embed_false: This feed does not use embed to be sent. Do you want to use an embed for this feed? (true/false)
use_embed_true: This feed currently uses embeds to be sent. Do you still want to use an embed for this feed? (true/false)
web-form-last:
{logo}  |  Here is the last post on {channel}:
**{title}**
*Written on {date}*
Link: {link}
web-invalid: Oops, this url address is invalid :confused:
yt-invalid: Oops, I couldn't find any YouTube channel with this ID!
